articles.title: The formation of the West Antarctic Ice Sheet was very different than previously believed - Phys.org

articles.title: Billionaire Carl Icahn targets McDonald's over pig welfare - CNN
articles.description: Legendary investor Carl Icahn is known for his aggressive campaigns to shake up Corporate America. Now, he's wielding his influence to tackle an issue close to his heart: the welfare of pigs.
